divs: Sighting DetailsCloud cover. shoveling snow, whole sky lit up twice a couple of minutes apart, I though it was lightning. I looked up after the second time and saw three objects moving rapidly through the sky. Light orangish-yellow Probably 3-5 miles away. Moving faster than any plane and could perform abrupt turns. Did not have blinking light like plane. Made no noise. I would love to know what this was.
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Salt Lake City
There were no other sightings in Salt Lake City on or around January 21st 2012
